00096         protected function save(&$queryFields) {
00097 
00098                 //if adodb is installed
00099                 if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('adodb')) {
00100                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('adodb').'adodb/adodb.inc.php');
00101                                 
00102                         //build sql
00103                                 
00104                         //insert query
00105                         if(!$this->doUpdate) {
00106                                 foreach($queryFields as $dbfield=>$value) {
00107                                         $fields[$dbfield] = $value;
00108                                         if(!is_numeric($value)) {
00109                                                 $fields[$dbfield] = "'".$value."'";
00110                                         }
00111                                 }
00112                                 $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->table." (".(implode(',',array_keys($fields))).") VALUES (".(implode(',',$fields)).")";
00113 
00114                                 //update query
00115                         } else {
00116 
00117                                 //check if uid of record to update is in GP
00118                                 $uid = $this->gp['uid'];
00119                                 if(!$uid) {
00120                                         $uid = $this->gp[$this->key];
00121                                 }
00122                                 if($uid) {
00123                                         $fields = array();
00124                                         foreach($queryFields as $dbfield=>$value) {
00125                                                 if(is_numeric($value)) {
00126                                                         $fields[] = $dbfield."=".$value;
00127                                                 } else {
00128                                                         $fields[] = $dbfield."='".$value."'";
00129                                                 }
00130                                         }
00131                                         $fields = implode(",",$fields);
00132                                         $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->table." SET (".$fields.") WHERE ".$this->key."=".$uid;
00133                                 } else {
00134                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('no_update_possible');
00135                                 }
00136                         }
00137                                 
00138                         //open connection
00139                         $conn = &NewADOConnection($this->driver);
00140                         $host = $this->host;
00141                         if($this->port) {
00142                                 $host .= ":".$this->port;
00143                         }
00144                         if($this->db) {
00145                                 $conn->Connect($host, $this->user, $this->password, $this->db);
00146                         } else {
00147                                 $conn->Connect($host, $this->user, $this->password);
00148                         }
00149                                 
00150                         //insert data
00151                         $conn->Execute($sql);
00152                                 
00153                         //close connection
00154                         $conn->Close();
00155                 } else {
00156                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::throwException('extension_required','adodb','F3_MailformPlsuPlus_Finisher_DifferentDB');
00157                 }
00158         }
00159 
00166         protected function init() {
00167                 parent::init();
00168                 $this->driver = $this->settings['driver'];
00169                 $this->db = $this->settings['db'];
00170                 $this->host = $this->settings['host'];
00171                 $this->port = $this->settings['port'];
00172                 $this->user = $this->settings['username'];
00173                 $this->password = $this->settings['password'];
00174                 if(!$this->driver) {
00175                         throw new Exception("No driver given!");
00176                 }
00177         }
